unit.utterance: Yek bāqi bud fekr konam yā yek zamini ke hič hesāri doraš nabud
unit.utterance_translation: there was a garden I think with no fence around it

unit.utterance: yek deraxte golābi bud
unit.utterance_translation: there was a pear tree

unit.utterance: baad yek āqāyi ham dāšt ānjā golābi mičid
unit.utterance_translation: and a man was picking pears from it

unit.utterance: do tā sabade golābi por dāšt golābi mičid
unit.utterance_translation: two baskets full of pears

unit.utterance: baad sedāye boz va az injur čizhā ham miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: then there was the sound of a goat or something like that

unit.utterance: baad yek āqāyi bā yek boz az ānjā rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: then a man with a goat is passing

unit.utterance: baad in āqā miāyad dobāre golābihā rā mičinad miravad bālā
unit.utterance_translation: then again the man goes up the tree and picks the pears

unit.utterance: miravad bālāye deraxt, az ān var yek pesarbače bā dočarxe az kenāre golābihā rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: he climbed up the tree, then a little boy on a bike comes by

unit.utterance: miāyad miresad be in sabadhāye golābi negāh mikonad mibinad dorobaraš hičkas nis, negāh mikonad mibinad āqāhe ān bālā ast saraš ham garm be čidane mive ast
unit.utterance_translation: he sees the baskets, looks around, nobody is there and the man is on the tree picking pears

unit.utterance: miāyad yek sabade golābihā rā barmidārad, migozārad joloye dočarxeaš, bārbande dočarxeaš, baad miravad
unit.utterance_translation: he takes one of the baskets, puts is in front of his bike and goes away

unit.utterance: vaqti dāšt miraft az ān masiri ke miravad tuye jade yek doxtari rā mibinad, yek doxtari dāšt az ruberu miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: on his way he sees a girl who is coming the opposite direction

unit.utterance: inhā jade tang bud, xeyli bārik bud, az kenāre ham ke rad mišavand, hālā nemidānam bād bud yā doxtare beheš xord in dāšt doxtar rā negāh mikard
unit.utterance_translation: the road was narrow, while they are passing by, he is watching the girl

unit.utterance: kolāhaš mioftad baad in ham havāsaš part mišavad baad haminjur ke dāšt doxtar rā negāh mikard mixorad be yek sangi
unit.utterance_translation: his hat falls down, he gets distracted and while he is staring at the girl, he goes over a stone

unit.utterance: mixorad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he falls down

unit.utterance: bā dočarxe mixorad zamin tamāme golābihāyaš paxš mišavad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: and all the pears spilled out of the basket

unit.utterance: baad haminjur ruye zamin nešaste bud digar baad yekho sedāye yek čizi engār yek sedāyi mesle dārkub miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: he was sitting on the ground and the sound of a woodpecker or something like that could be heard

unit.utterance: baad negāh mikonad mibinad se tā pesarbače hastand
unit.utterance_translation: he looks around and sees three boys

unit.utterance: yekišān yek rākete tennis dārad bā yek tup hey mizanad be rāket
unit.utterance_translation: one of them has a rocket in his hand and plays with a ball

unit.utterance: baad ānhā miāyand pišaš yani do tāšān miāyand beheš komak mikonand bolandaš mikonand tanaš ra mitekānand
unit.utterance_translation: the boys come to help him get up and cleans his dusty clothes

unit.utterance: yeki ham golābihāyaš rā az ruye zamin jam mikonad
unit.utterance_translation: one of them gathers his pears

unit.utterance: mirizad tuye sabad in ham boland mišavad dočarxeaš rā barmidārad golābihā rā ham barmidārad, in sabad rā migozārad ruye bārbande dočarxeaš
unit.utterance_translation: puts them in the basket, the little boy gets up, takes his bike and the pears, and puts the basket in the front of his bike

unit.utterance: vaqti mixāst beravad ānhā ke do se qadam miravand jelotar mibinand kolāhaš ruye zamin oftāde
unit.utterance_translation: the boys find his hat on the ground

unit.utterance: yekišān āni ke rākete tennis dāšt sut mizanad
unit.utterance_translation: the one who has a tennis rocket whistles

unit.utterance: baad in barmigardad negāhaš mikonad baad kolāhaš rā mibarad beheš midahad
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy returns, looks at him, he gives him back his hat

unit.utterance: se tā golābi barmidārad se tā golābihā rā fekr konam yavāšaki ham barmidārad
unit.utterance_translation: and takes three pears in return

unit.utterance: engār u motevajeh nemišavad baad in se tā golābihā rā miyāvard midahad be in se tā, yeki xodaš do tā ham be ān do tā
unit.utterance_translation: it seems that little boy doesn't notice, he brings the pears and give each of his friends one pear

unit.utterance: baad rākete tennis rā ham az poštaš barmidārad, dobāre hey tup rā mizanad be in
unit.utterance_translation: and starts playing with the ball and the rocket again

unit.utterance: baad in pesare ham miravad
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy leaves

unit.utterance: az in var in āqāhe rā nešān midahad, az bālāye deraxt miāyad pāyin, kāraš tamām mišvad miāyad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: then it shows that the man comes down when he finishes his work

unit.utterance: miāyad ke golābihāyi ke dar jibe jeloyaš jam karde bud dobāre berizad tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: he comes down to put the pears again in the basket

unit.utterance: negāh mikonad, mibinad sabadhāyaš kam ast yek dāne
unit.utterance_translation: he found out one of the basket is not there

unit.utterance: yeki do tā baad mišomārad mibinad sevomi nist haminjur taajob mikonad miistad ān se tā pesarbače ham dāštand miyāmadand
unit.utterance_translation: he counts the basket and notices that the third one is not there, he gets surprised and the boys are passing

unit.utterance: be tartibi ke dāštand rad mišodand, negāh mikonad mibinad daste harkodāmešān yek golābi ast, yeki ham bā rākete tennis injuri dārad mizanad be čiz be rāketaš, baad miravad va in ham haminjur be ānhā negāh mikonad va tamām mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: he looks at the boys who have pears in their hands, one of them is playing with a rocket and a ball, he is watching them while they are passing and the story ended.
